Kabindra Shrestha

Hi! I'm a Computer Science student at Vanderbilt University's School of Engineering.

Education

Vanderbilt University
CS Major and Engineering Management Minor

I am sophomore at Vanderbilt University persuing Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and a minor in Engineering Management. I am invested in school clubs like Vanderbilt Free and Open Source Society, iLEAD, and Vanderbilt Student Volunteers for Science.

Professional Experience

Leapfrog Technology
Website interface and Digital Marketing Intern

Right after my highschool, I got an opportunity to work as an intern in an software company in Nepal, Leapfrog Technology. I worked on creating front-end for websites for an pharceutical company, Eazy Care, and an finance Company, Nihal Finance. I also worked on creating posts and promoting ads for Nihal Finance on Facebook.

My other interests

Besides coding, I love playing the guitar, reading books, and going on a long hike. I like learning foreign languages and learning about other cultures; I'm currently learning German. I also like to sketch anime characters.
